title: BE THOU GLORIFIED O LORD
bible_ref: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name. Ps. 86:9
verses: Be Thou glorified O Lord, be Thou glorified O Lord=As we gather in your name, to worship you O Lord=O, be Thou glorified O Lord.
Be Thou magnified O Lord, be Thou magnified O Lord=As we gather in your house to worship you O Lord=O, be Thou magnified O Lord.
